name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned QA Automation Engineer specializing in Payments, I bring 8+ years of experience in software engineering with a strong focus on **Test Automation Frameworks**, **API Testing**, and **CI/CD Pipelines**. I am proficient in **Java** and **Kotlin**, employing **Test Driven Development (TDD)** and **Behavior Driven Development (BDD)** methodologies to ensure high-quality software delivery. My background includes extensive knowledge of payment systems, including **EMV**, **E-commerce Transactions**, and **Payment Service Provider (PSP) Integrations**. I excel in performance and load testing, with expertise in tools such as **Postman** for API testing. I am well-versed in **Kafka** for handling payment message formats, along with **JSON** and **XML** for data interchange. Leveraging my understanding of **PCI-DSS**, **PSD2**, and **SCA** compliance, I build solutions that meet critical regulatory standards. I thrive in **Agile Methodologies** practices, including **SCRUM** and **KANBAN**. I complement these technical skills with my commitment to delivering secure, efficient, and reliable solutions that align with industry best practices and evolving client needs.

• Conducted comprehensive **Performance Testing** and **Load Testing** on payment platforms, measuring response times, throughput, and scalability under different loads.
• Integrated **CI/CD Pipelines** using tools like Jenkins and GitHub Actions to streamline testing workflows, ensuring seamless deployment of quality releases.
• Collaborated with development teams using **Agile Methodologies** such as **SCRUM** and **KANBAN**, fostering a culture of quality and continuous improvement across processes.
• Created and executed test cases in **Postman** for payment service provider (**PSP**) integrations and **JSON**/**XML** payment message formats to ensure data integrity and functional compliance.
• Implemented **Behavior Driven Development (BDD)** and **Test Driven Development (TDD)** practices, enhancing collaboration between QA and development teams for better communication of requirements.
• Worked with event-driven architectures leveraging **Kafka** to ensure reliable message processing, enhancing the overall payment system's robustness.
• Participated in technical design reviews to ensure testability and quality of payment functionalities, offering insights on potential mitigations against **SCA** risks.
• Assisted in the management and optimization of payment systems, ensuring security and compliance with the latest industry standards.
• Actively contributed to the documentation of testing processes, results, and defect reports to maintain clear communication with the development and product teams.
